Subskills.name: Outbursting Charge
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by ball lightning.

Subskills.name: Thicker Coil
Subskills.description: Gain increased lightning resistance when using ball lightning.

Subskills.name: Hovering Bolt
Subskills.description: Become an orb of lightning and hover to the target location unleashing chain lightning on nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Flash from the Sky
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage when using ball lightning.

Subskills.name: Overcharge
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit when using ball lightning.

Subskills.name: Rapid Retreat
Subskills.description: When landing gain increased movement speed and defense for a short period.

Subskills.name: Charged Bolts
Subskills.description: When landing additionally unleash multiple charged bolts bouncing off of terrain dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Phantom Ball
Subskills.description: Chance when casting to summon phantom illusions jumping into nearby monsters dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Charging Ball
Subskills.description: Unleash a charged storm of lightning on nearby monsters when landing dealing increased damage with increased area of effect radius. Ball lightning now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Within the Storm
Subskills.description: Chance when landing to render you immune to all damage for a short period.

Subskills.name: Efficient Vains
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of ball lightning.

Subskills.name: Angelic Interference
Subskills.description: When below 25% life ball lightning gains increased speed, damage, area of effect and knocks monsters into the air.

Subskills.name: Pulsating Thunderball
Subskills.description: When landing you instead bounce multiple times releasing electrified pulses with increased damage and area of effect radius when landing.

Subskills.name: Righteous Leap
Subskills.description: When landing taunt nearby monsters and increases your damage return for a short period.
